name: D E A D S P E A K
name_original: D E A D S P E A K
description:
An interactive fiction game about Dalton Smith, a teenage boy looking for his dead sister's ghost and finding much more. Sometimes death comes too soon and there's nothing you can do about it. Well—except get rid of the one cutting the string.

---

A story in two acts told semi-linearly. Play time for each act is about 45 minutes.

If you enjoyed this game, please consider supporting it for a few dollars! 

D E A D S P E A K contains potentially upsetting content. A full list of content warnings is available after the title screen. 

---

C R E D I T S:

  • Written and designed by: a.c.d
  • Cover by: a.c.d
  • Sensitivity read by: Noelle S
  • Edited by: Leviticus Greenley and Jude C

Written over the course of many years and completed in 2022
